content: I just got an email asking if I'd be willing to write a review about Zulip on https://www.softwarereviews.com/products/zulip
I see that the same four questions are asked so I'm going to start a topic for each question. Maybe we can brainstorm together.

Here are the questions, in order:

  • #zulip > What differentiates Zulip from other similar products?
  • #zulip > What is your favorite aspect of Zulip?
  • #zulip > What do you dislike most about Zulip?
  • #zulip > Recommendations for someone considering Zulip?
Ok, I wrote a little bit, at least, in the topics above. Please feel free to write more in each one!
